Kenney Asset Packs (Curated Subset)

Source:
- https://kenney.nl/assets

Author / Publisher:
- Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

License:
- CC0 1.0 Universal (see LICENSE_CC0-1.0.txt in this folder)

Retrieved:
- 2025-12-21

Notes:
- This repository only ingests a curated subset of sprites needed for currently shipped entity types.
- Sprites are normalized to the game’s expectations (32×32 alignment, nearest-neighbor only).
